Data.title: Taiwan Turns to Ethereum IPFS Tech to Thwart Chinese Cyberattacks
Data.body: As tensions with China heat up, Taipei officials leverage decentralized publishing and storage to stay online.

Data.title: Gala is announcing a partnership with Stick Figure Productions to distribute Four Down on the Blockchain
Data.body: Jackson, WY, USA, 11th August, 2022, Chainwire Gala, one of the leading innovators in blockchain gaming and music, has announced the launch of Gala Film. This new vertical from the world-leading Web3 company continues the brandâ€™s commitment to providing fans with unique opportunities to enrich their experiences coupled with amazing programming and exciting projects.
